title: Plank
body: Sustain your body on the balls of your feet and on either your hands or elbows.  Keep the body as straight as possible and hold for up to a minute.

title: Crunches
body: Lay on the floor or on a mat, keep the knees at a 45 degree angle with the feet firmly planted on the floor, and crunch your abs bringing your face towards your knees till your core reaches a 45 degree angle.

title: Bridging
body: Lay flat on the floor, then bring your feet as close to your butt as possible.  Keeping the weight on your feet lift your hips as high as possible.  Repeat or sustain move for up to a minute.

title: Pull Up Crunch
body: Grab and hold a pull up bar, or use arm straps to hang, keep either the knees bent, or for a more intense workout keep them straight, and while bending at the hips, try to bring your knees or toes as high as possible in fron of your body.

title: Bicycles
body: Laying on the floor or on a mat crunch your abs until you're sustaining a 45 degree angle.  Lift your feet off the floor and, while keeping one knee as close to your head as possible, slowly kick the opposite leg out till the leg is straight and about 6 inches above the ground.  Bring it back in towards the face while kicking out the opposite leg.
